about_the_game:
~Summary~
"Wanko of Marriage" is an adventure game about two humanoid black shiba inu girls who are vying to become your bride.
It features deep love-making scenarios with cute heroines, all displayed with gorgeous event CG.
There are also some comedic SD events to create a fun and interesting atmosphere.

~Story~
Toya Inuzuka is the successor to the family shrine.
However, he dreams of becoming a pâtissier, and opening his own shop.
"As promised long ago, I have come to marry you"
Complicating things further are these two fluffy-eared and bushy-tailed messengers of god, Koharu and Azuki.
It is their dream to marry Toya...
The three of them will have to work together to fulfill their dreams!

~Characters~

Koharu
The bright and honest older sister of Azuki. Speaks kindly to everyone in a calm, polite voice, but is said to be very scary when angry...

Stats: 154cm, 85(C-cup), 53, 84
Interests & skills: Walking, cooking
Likes: Toya's sweets
Dislikes: Bugs

Azuki
An energetic girl who likes to move, and loves to eat. Appears to be a girl who doesn't sweat the small stuff, but she does have a sensitive side.

Stats: 154cm, 87(D-cup), 53, 85
Interests & skills: Walking, using her body.
Likes: Delicious food
Dislikes: Showers

content_descriptors.notes:
Contains non-explicit depictions of sexual behavior, possibly including partial nudity.
Mild provocative references or materials.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 7,8,8.1,10
  • Processor: Core2Duo equivalent or above
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: VRAM64MB or above
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 7,8,8.1,10
  • Processor: Corei3 equivalent or above
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: VRAM128MB or above
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Toya Inuzuka is the successor to the family shrine but dreams of becoming a pâtissier. Complicating things further are these two fluffy-eared and bushy-tailed messengers of god, Koharu and Azuki dream to marry Toya... The three of them will have to work together to fulfill their dreams!
